resources.string: White, and websites can change the toolbar color
A white toolbar (except in night mode)

Please read carefully and fully understand the software license agreement and privacy policy. You can read <LINK1>《Software license agreement》</LINK1> and <LINK2>《Privacy policy》</LINK2> and<LINK3>《Third party SDK Directory》</LINK3> learn more. You need to read and agree to all the terms of the above agreement before you start using the XKBrowser.

XKBrowser needs storage and device information permissions to provide file management services (bookmark / download services, etc.) and diagnose problems; Location permissions are required to provide local information. The mobile phone system will request permission. You can check it freely.
You must upgrade before continuing to use
Use external APP to access the site
You cannot access the extension program in incognito
